channel.title: Posts on Moving images in space-time
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Moving images in space-time

item.title: The Peanut Butter Falcon (2019)
item.description: A modern Mark Twain style adventure story, THE PEANUT BUTTER FALCON tells the story of Zak, a young man with Down syndrome, who runs away from a residential nursing home to follow his dream of attending the professional wrestling school.

item.title: The Irishman (2019)
item.description: Frank Sheeran (Robert De Niro), a Mafia hitman, looks back on his life and his mob career with emphasis on his relationships with famous American labour leader, Jimmy Hoffa (Al Pacino) and Russell Bufalino, the head of the Northeastern Pennsylvania crime family (Joe Pesci).
